alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 04 at 5:56PM EDT until July 05 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Statement, from midnight tonight to 3 AM EDT Wednesday. For the second Coastal Flood Statement, late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An additional round of brief minor flooding is possible with the evening high tide cycle Thursday.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
